commits.message:
EUCA-11150 - eucalyptus-bootstrap.c:__get_pid method contains resource leak

Description: On failures to read the pid from the file properly via fscanf() the FILE pointer would not get closed properly.

Changes: Changed the code to remove the __abort macro and fclose the FILE pointer correctly.

Testing:
 - Tested an invalid PID (that isn't running on the system), should return -1.
 - Tested empty file for the PID file, in which case return is -1.
